description: Message display once suggestion is approved or rejected successfully.
Message display when it fails to approve or reject suggestion.
defaultMessage: Error when trying to update suggestion. Please try again or contact the support if the error persists.

description: Title of the alert message displayed on item page for suggestions.
defaultMessage: Media and Requests appear to be similar to an existing item in your workspace. Are they a good match?

description: Button label to accept similarity suggestion.
Button label to reject similarity suggestion.
